name: 傅子恒
objective:
本課程強調基本美學知識的培養與數位技術的融合，將數位影像的製作、編輯設計的美感原理，應用於互動媒體設計，透過實作練習美感技巧，融合如 Photoshop, Illustrator, Indesign, After Effects. 3D  等軟體應用於多媒體技術，從設計實踐與鑑賞中，培養學生的創造力和美感判斷能力。
This course emphasizes the cultivation of basic aesthetics knowledge and the integration of digital technology. It applies the principles of aesthetics in the production and editing of digital images, and applies them to interactive media design. Through practical exercises in aesthetic techniques, students will learn how to apply software such as Photoshop, Illustrator, Indesign, After Effects, and 3D modeling software to multimedia technology. Through a combination of design practice and appreciation, students will cultivate their creativity and aesthetic judgment skills.
